command: [withheld] PowerShell starting cscript.exe to execute SyncAppvPublishingServer.vbs with crafted parameters that cause a downstream process launch (details redacted).
explanation: Abuses the signed SyncAppvPublishingServer.vbs (part of App-V) to proxy into another process, taking advantage of the trust boundary of signed scripts to execute additional code.
rationale_steps: Arguments to the script contain atypical flags or embedded strings inconsistent with normal App-V sync activity.
Observe cscript.exe or the script starting a non-App-V-related process (e.g., powershell.exe or cmd.exe).
No corresponding App-V publishing events occur despite the script invocation.
Time-of-day/user context inconsistent with typical App-V maintenance operations.
